name: restapi-cli
description: restapi-cli is a command-line interface tool designed to simplify and expedite the process of creating RESTful APIs in Node.js. With restapi-cli, developers can generate boilerplate code, endpoints, controllers, and more with just a few simple commands, streamlining the API development workflow. Whether you're a beginner looking to get started quickly or an experienced developer aiming to speed up your development process, restapi-cli provides the tools you need to build robust APIs effortlessly.
